name: Edmonton Trolley Car
description: Players take an immersive VR historically accurate trolley car ride down 1915 Whyte Avenue, and then over the High Level Bridge. All the while receiving points for interacting with in-game characters, and for viewing historical Edmonton landmarks.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: This game is better experienced with sound Additional Notes: This game was designed for the HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: This game is better experienced with sound Additional Notes: This game was designed for the HTC Vive
